mapper.select: SELECT /* com.at.apcss.am.wrhs.mapper.RawMtrWrhsMapper.selectRawMtrWrhs */ WP.APC_CD AS APC_CD , WP.WRHSNO AS WRHSNO , WP.WGHNO AS WGHNO , WP.PLTNO AS PLTNO , WP.WRHS_YMD AS WRHS_YMD , WP.PRDCR_CD AS PRDCR_CD , WP.VHCLNO AS VHCLNO , WP.BX_QNTT AS BX_QNTT , WP.WRHS_WGHT AS WRHS_WGHT , WP.RMRK AS RMRK , WP.DEL_YN AS DEL_YN , (SELECT X.PRCS_NO FROM TB_RAW_MTR_INVNTR X WHERE X.APC_CD = WP.APC_CD AND X.WRHSNO = WP.WRHSNO) AS PRCS_NO FROM TB_RAW_MTR_WRHS_PRFMNC WP WHERE WP.APC_CD = #{apcCd} AND WP.WRHSNO = #{wrhsno}

SELECT /* com.at.apcss.am.wrhs.mapper.RawMtrWrhsMapper.selectRawMtrPrcsList */
ROWNUM AS ROW_SEQ , COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTAL_RECORD_COUNT ,
pt0.* FROM ( SELECT WP.APC_CD AS APC_CD , WP.WRHSNO AS WRHSNO , WP.WGHNO AS WGHNO , WP.PLTNO AS PLTNO , WP.WRHS_YMD AS WRHS_YMD , WP.PRDCR_CD AS PRDCR_CD , INV.ITEM_CD AS ITEM_CD , INV.VRTY_CD AS VRTY_CD , INV.GDS_SE_CD AS GDS_SE_CD , INV.WRHS_SE_CD AS WRHS_SE_CD , INV.TRSPRT_SE_CD AS TRSPRT_SE_CD , INV.GRD_CD AS GRD_CD , WP.VHCLNO AS VHCLNO , WP.BX_QNTT AS BX_QNTT , WP.WRHS_WGHT AS WRHS_WGHT , INV.BX_KND AS BX_KND , INV.WAREHOUSE_SE_CD AS WAREHOUSE_SE_CD , INV.PRDCTN_YR AS PRDCTN_YR , WP.RMRK AS RMRK , INV.PRCS_TYPE AS PRCS_TYPE , INV.PRCS_NO AS PRCS_NO
FROM TB_RAW_MTR_WRHS_PRFMNC WP , TB_RAW_MTR_INVNTR INV
WHERE WP.APC_CD = INV.APC_CD AND WP.WRHSNO = INV.WRHSNO AND WP.DEL_YN = 'N' AND INV.DEL_YN = 'N' AND WP.APC_CD = #{apcCd} AND INV.PRCS_NO = #{prcsNo}
ORDER BY APC_CD, WRHS_YMD, WRHSNO ) pt0
OFFSET (#{currentPageNo} - 1) * #{recordCountPerPage} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{recordCountPerPage} ROWS ONLY

SELECT /* com.at.apcss.am.wrhs.mapper.RawMtrWrhsMapper.selectRawMtrPrcsInptList */
ROWNUM AS ROW_SEQ , COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTAL_RECORD_COUNT ,
pt0.* FROM ( SELECT RP.APC_CD AS APC_CD , RP.WRHSNO AS WRHSNO , RP.PRCS_NO AS PRCS_NO , RP.PRCS_SN AS PRCS_SN , RP.PRCS_YMD AS PRCS_YMD , RP.QNTT AS QNTT , RP.WGHT AS WGHT , INV.ITEM_CD AS ITEM_CD , INV.VRTY_CD AS VRTY_CD , INV.GDS_SE_CD AS GDS_SE_CD , INV.WRHS_SE_CD AS WRHS_SE_CD , INV.TRSPRT_SE_CD AS TRSPRT_SE_CD , INV.GRD_CD AS GRD_CD , INV.BX_KND AS BX_KND , INV.WAREHOUSE_SE_CD AS WAREHOUSE_SE_CD , INV.PRDCTN_YR AS PRDCTN_YR , INV.PRCS_TYPE AS PRCS_TYPE
FROM TB_RAW_MTR_PRCS RP , TB_RAW_MTR_INVNTR INV
WHERE RP.APC_CD = INV.APC_CD AND RP.WRHSNO = INV.WRHSNO AND RP.DEL_YN = 'N' AND INV.DEL_YN = 'N' AND RP.APC_CD = #{apcCd} AND RP.PRCS_NO = #{prcsNo}
ORDER BY APC_CD, PRCS_NO, PRCS_SN ) pt0
OFFSET (#{currentPageNo} - 1) * #{recordCountPerPage} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{recordCountPerPage} ROWS ONLY

SELECT /* com.at.apcss.am.wrhs.mapper.RawMtrWrhsMapper.selectRawMtrWrhsSmmry */ WS.APC_CD AS APC_CD , WS.WRHS_BGNG_YMD AS WRHS_BGNG_YMD , WS.WRHS_END_YMD AS WRHS_END_YMD , WS.PRDCR_CD AS PRDCR_CD , WS.ITEM_CD AS ITEM_CD , WS.VRTY_CD AS VRTY_CD , WS.GDS_SE_CD AS GDS_SE_CD , WS.WRHS_SE_CD AS WRHS_SE_CD , WS.TRSPRT_SE_CD AS TRSPRT_SE_CD , WS.WAREHOUSE_SE_CD AS WAREHOUSE_SE_CD , WS.GRD_CD AS GRD_CD , WS.PRDCTN_YR AS PRDCTN_YR , WS.INVNTR_STTS_CD AS INVNTR_STTS_CD , WS.WRHS_CMPTN_YN AS WRHS_CMPTN_YN , WS.QNTT_CYCL_1 AS QNTT_CYCL_1 , WS.QNTT_CYCL_2 AS QNTT_CYCL_2 , WS.QNTT_CYCL_3 AS QNTT_CYCL_3 , WS.QNTT_CYCL_4 AS QNTT_CYCL_4 , WS.QNTT_CYCL_5 AS QNTT_CYCL_5 , WS.WGHT_CYCL_1 AS WGHT_CYCL_1 , WS.WGHT_CYCL_2 AS WGHT_CYCL_2 , WS.WGHT_CYCL_3 AS WGHT_CYCL_3 , WS.WGHT_CYCL_4 AS WGHT_CYCL_4 , WS.WGHT_CYCL_5 AS WGHT_CYCL_5 , WS.RMRK AS RMRK , WS.DEL_YN AS DEL_YN FROM TB_RAW_MTR_WRHS_SMMRY WS WHERE WS.APC_CD = #{apcCd} AND WS.WRHS_BGNG_YMD = #{wrhsBgngYmd} AND WS.WRHS_END_YMD = #{wrhsEndYmd} AND WS.PRDCR_CD = #{prdcrCd} AND WS.ITEM_CD = #{itemCd} AND WS.VRTY_CD = #{vrtyCd}

SELECT /* com.at.apcss.am.wrhs.mapper.RawMtrWrhsMapper.selectRawMtrWrhsSmmryList */ WS.APC_CD AS APC_CD , WS.WRHS_BGNG_YMD AS WRHS_BGNG_YMD , WS.WRHS_END_YMD AS WRHS_END_YMD , WS.PRDCR_CD AS PRDCR_CD , WS.ITEM_CD AS ITEM_CD , WS.VRTY_CD AS VRTY_CD , WS.GDS_SE_CD AS GDS_SE_CD , WS.WRHS_SE_CD AS WRHS_SE_CD , WS.TRSPRT_SE_CD AS TRSPRT_SE_CD , WS.WAREHOUSE_SE_CD AS WAREHOUSE_SE_CD , WS.GRD_CD AS GRD_CD , WS.PRDCTN_YR AS PRDCTN_YR , WS.INVNTR_STTS_CD AS INVNTR_STTS_CD , WS.WRHS_CMPTN_YN AS WRHS_CMPTN_YN , WS.QNTT_CYCL_1 AS QNTT_CYCL_1 , WS.QNTT_CYCL_2 AS QNTT_CYCL_2 , WS.QNTT_CYCL_3 AS QNTT_CYCL_3 , WS.QNTT_CYCL_4 AS QNTT_CYCL_4 , WS.QNTT_CYCL_5 AS QNTT_CYCL_5 , WS.WGHT_CYCL_1 AS WGHT_CYCL_1 , WS.WGHT_CYCL_2 AS WGHT_CYCL_2 , WS.WGHT_CYCL_3 AS WGHT_CYCL_3 , WS.WGHT_CYCL_4 AS WGHT_CYCL_4 , WS.WGHT_CYCL_5 AS WGHT_CYCL_5 , WS.RMRK AS RMRK , WS.DEL_YN AS DEL_YN FROM TB_RAW_MTR_WRHS_SMMRY WS WHERE WS.APC_CD = #{apcCd} AND WS.WRHS_BGNG_YMD = #{wrhsBgngYmd} AND WS.WRHS_END_YMD = #{wrhsEndYmd} AND WS.PRDCR_CD = #{prdcrCd} AND WS.ITEM_CD = #{itemCd} AND WS.VRTY_CD = #{vrtyCd}

SELECT /* com.at.apcss.am.wrhs.mapper.RawMtrWrhsMapper.selectRawMtrWrhsSmmryTotalList */ pt0.* , (SELECT FN_GET_ITEM_NM(pt0.ITEM_CD, pt0.APC_CD) FROM DUAL) AS ITEM_NM , (SELECT FN_GET_PRDCR_NM(pt0.PRDCR_CD, pt0.APC_CD) FROM DUAL) AS PRDCR_NM FROM ( SELECT A.APC_CD AS APC_CD , A.WRHS_BGNG_YMD AS WRHS_BGNG_YMD , A.WRHS_END_YMD AS WRHS_END_YMD , A.PRDCR_CD AS PRDCR_CD , A.ITEM_CD AS ITEM_CD
, MAX(ITM.VRTY_CD_1) AS VRTY_CD_1 , MAX(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_1 THEN A.WRHS_CMPTN_YN ELSE NULL END) AS V_1_WRHS_CMPTN_YN , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_1 THEN A.QNTT_CYCL_1 ELSE NULL END) AS V_1_QNTT_CYCL_1 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_1 THEN A.QNTT_CYCL_2 ELSE NULL END) AS V_1_QNTT_CYCL_2 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_1 THEN A.QNTT_CYCL_3 ELSE NULL END) AS V_1_QNTT_CYCL_3 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_1 THEN A.QNTT_CYCL_4 ELSE NULL END) AS V_1_QNTT_CYCL_4 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_1 THEN A.QNTT_CYCL_5 ELSE NULL END) AS V_1_QNTT_CYCL_5 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_1 THEN A.WGHT_CYCL_1 ELSE NULL END) AS V_1_WGHT_CYCL_1 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_1 THEN A.WGHT_CYCL_2 ELSE NULL END) AS V_1_WGHT_CYCL_2 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_1 THEN A.WGHT_CYCL_3 ELSE NULL END) AS V_1_WGHT_CYCL_3 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_1 THEN A.WGHT_CYCL_4 ELSE NULL END) AS V_1_WGHT_CYCL_4 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_1 THEN A.WGHT_CYCL_5 ELSE NULL END) AS V_1_WGHT_CYCL_5 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_1 THEN A.QNTT ELSE NULL END) AS V_1_QNTT , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_1 THEN A.WGHT ELSE NULL END) AS V_1_WGHT
, MAX(ITM.VRTY_CD_2) AS VRTY_CD_2 , MAX(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_2 THEN A.WRHS_CMPTN_YN ELSE NULL END) AS V_2_WRHS_CMPTN_YN , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_2 THEN A.QNTT_CYCL_1 ELSE NULL END) AS V_2_QNTT_CYCL_1 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_2 THEN A.QNTT_CYCL_2 ELSE NULL END) AS V_2_QNTT_CYCL_2 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_2 THEN A.QNTT_CYCL_3 ELSE NULL END) AS V_2_QNTT_CYCL_3 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_2 THEN A.QNTT_CYCL_4 ELSE NULL END) AS V_2_QNTT_CYCL_4 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_2 THEN A.QNTT_CYCL_5 ELSE NULL END) AS V_2_QNTT_CYCL_5 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_2 THEN A.WGHT_CYCL_1 ELSE NULL END) AS V_2_WGHT_CYCL_1 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_2 THEN A.WGHT_CYCL_2 ELSE NULL END) AS V_2_WGHT_CYCL_2 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_2 THEN A.WGHT_CYCL_3 ELSE NULL END) AS V_2_WGHT_CYCL_3 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_2 THEN A.WGHT_CYCL_4 ELSE NULL END) AS V_2_WGHT_CYCL_4 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_2 THEN A.WGHT_CYCL_5 ELSE NULL END) AS V_2_WGHT_CYCL_5 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_2 THEN A.QNTT ELSE NULL END) AS V_2_QNTT , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_2 THEN A.WGHT ELSE NULL END) AS V_2_WGHT
, MAX(ITM.VRTY_CD_3) AS VRTY_CD_3 , MAX(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_3 THEN A.WRHS_CMPTN_YN ELSE NULL END) AS V_3_WRHS_CMPTN_YN , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_3 THEN A.QNTT_CYCL_1 ELSE NULL END) AS V_3_QNTT_CYCL_1 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_3 THEN A.QNTT_CYCL_2 ELSE NULL END) AS V_3_QNTT_CYCL_2 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_3 THEN A.QNTT_CYCL_3 ELSE NULL END) AS V_3_QNTT_CYCL_3 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_3 THEN A.QNTT_CYCL_4 ELSE NULL END) AS V_3_QNTT_CYCL_4 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_3 THEN A.QNTT_CYCL_5 ELSE NULL END) AS V_3_QNTT_CYCL_5 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_3 THEN A.WGHT_CYCL_1 ELSE NULL END) AS V_3_WGHT_CYCL_1 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_3 THEN A.WGHT_CYCL_2 ELSE NULL END) AS V_3_WGHT_CYCL_2 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_3 THEN A.WGHT_CYCL_3 ELSE NULL END) AS V_3_WGHT_CYCL_3 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_3 THEN A.WGHT_CYCL_4 ELSE NULL END) AS V_3_WGHT_CYCL_4 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_3 THEN A.WGHT_CYCL_5 ELSE NULL END) AS V_3_WGHT_CYCL_5 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_3 THEN A.QNTT ELSE NULL END) AS V_3_QNTT , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_3 THEN A.WGHT ELSE NULL END) AS V_3_WGHT
, MAX(ITM.VRTY_CD_4) AS VRTY_CD_4 , MAX(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_4 THEN A.WRHS_CMPTN_YN ELSE NULL END) AS V_4_WRHS_CMPTN_YN , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_4 THEN A.QNTT_CYCL_1 ELSE NULL END) AS V_4_QNTT_CYCL_1 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_4 THEN A.QNTT_CYCL_2 ELSE NULL END) AS V_4_QNTT_CYCL_2 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_4 THEN A.QNTT_CYCL_3 ELSE NULL END) AS V_4_QNTT_CYCL_3 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_4 THEN A.QNTT_CYCL_4 ELSE NULL END) AS V_4_QNTT_CYCL_4 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_4 THEN A.QNTT_CYCL_5 ELSE NULL END) AS V_4_QNTT_CYCL_5 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_4 THEN A.WGHT_CYCL_1 ELSE NULL END) AS V_4_WGHT_CYCL_1 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_4 THEN A.WGHT_CYCL_2 ELSE NULL END) AS V_4_WGHT_CYCL_2 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_4 THEN A.WGHT_CYCL_3 ELSE NULL END) AS V_4_WGHT_CYCL_3 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_4 THEN A.WGHT_CYCL_4 ELSE NULL END) AS V_4_WGHT_CYCL_4 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_4 THEN A.WGHT_CYCL_5 ELSE NULL END) AS V_4_WGHT_CYCL_5 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_4 THEN A.QNTT ELSE NULL END) AS V_4_QNTT , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_4 THEN A.WGHT ELSE NULL END) AS V_4_WGHT
, MAX(ITM.VRTY_CD_5) AS VRTY_CD_5 , MAX(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_5 THEN A.WRHS_CMPTN_YN ELSE NULL END) AS V_5_WRHS_CMPTN_YN , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_5 THEN A.QNTT_CYCL_1 ELSE NULL END) AS V_5_QNTT_CYCL_1 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_5 THEN A.QNTT_CYCL_2 ELSE NULL END) AS V_5_QNTT_CYCL_2 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_5 THEN A.QNTT_CYCL_3 ELSE NULL END) AS V_5_QNTT_CYCL_3 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_5 THEN A.QNTT_CYCL_4 ELSE NULL END) AS V_5_QNTT_CYCL_4 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_5 THEN A.QNTT_CYCL_5 ELSE NULL END) AS V_5_QNTT_CYCL_5 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_5 THEN A.WGHT_CYCL_1 ELSE NULL END) AS V_5_WGHT_CYCL_1 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_5 THEN A.WGHT_CYCL_2 ELSE NULL END) AS V_5_WGHT_CYCL_2 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_5 THEN A.WGHT_CYCL_3 ELSE NULL END) AS V_5_WGHT_CYCL_3 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_5 THEN A.WGHT_CYCL_4 ELSE NULL END) AS V_5_WGHT_CYCL_4 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_5 THEN A.WGHT_CYCL_5 ELSE NULL END) AS V_5_WGHT_CYCL_5 , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_5 THEN A.QNTT ELSE NULL END) AS V_5_QNTT , SUM(CASE WHEN A.VRTY_CD = ITM.VRTY_CD_5 THEN A.WGHT ELSE NULL END) AS V_5_WGHT
FROM ( SELECT WS.APC_CD AS APC_CD , WS.WRHS_BGNG_YMD AS WRHS_BGNG_YMD , WS.WRHS_END_YMD AS WRHS_END_YMD , WS.PRDCR_CD AS PRDCR_CD , WS.ITEM_CD AS ITEM_CD , WS.VRTY_CD AS VRTY_CD , WS.GDS_SE_CD AS GDS_SE_CD , WS.WRHS_SE_CD AS WRHS_SE_CD , WS.TRSPRT_SE_CD AS TRSPRT_SE_CD , WS.WAREHOUSE_SE_CD AS WAREHOUSE_SE_CD , WS.GRD_CD AS GRD_CD , WS.PRDCTN_YR AS PRDCTN_YR , WS.INVNTR_STTS_CD AS INVNTR_STTS_CD , WS.WRHS_CMPTN_YN AS WRHS_CMPTN_YN , WS.QNTT_CYCL_1 AS QNTT_CYCL_1 , WS.QNTT_CYCL_2 AS QNTT_CYCL_2 , WS.QNTT_CYCL_3 AS QNTT_CYCL_3 , WS.QNTT_CYCL_4 AS QNTT_CYCL_4 , WS.QNTT_CYCL_5 AS QNTT_CYCL_5 , NVL(WS.QNTT_CYCL_1, 0) + NVL(WS.QNTT_CYCL_2, 0) + NVL(WS.QNTT_CYCL_3, 0) + NVL(WS.QNTT_CYCL_4, 0) + NVL(WS.QNTT_CYCL_5, 0) AS QNTT , WS.WGHT_CYCL_1 AS WGHT_CYCL_1 , WS.WGHT_CYCL_2 AS WGHT_CYCL_2 , WS.WGHT_CYCL_3 AS WGHT_CYCL_3 , WS.WGHT_CYCL_4 AS WGHT_CYCL_4 , WS.WGHT_CYCL_5 AS WGHT_CYCL_5 , NVL(WS.WGHT_CYCL_1, 0) + NVL(WS.WGHT_CYCL_2, 0) + NVL(WS.WGHT_CYCL_3, 0) + NVL(WS.WGHT_CYCL_4, 0) + NVL(WS.WGHT_CYCL_5, 0) AS WGHT , WS.RMRK AS RMRK , WS.DEL_YN AS DEL_YN FROM TB_RAW_MTR_WRHS_SMMRY WS WHERE WS.APC_CD = #{apcCd} AND WS.ITEM_CD = #{itemCd} AND WS.WRHS_BGNG_YMD = #{wrhsBgngYmd} AND WS.WRHS_END_YMD = #{wrhsEndYmd} AND WS.DEL_YN = 'N'
) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT X.ITEM_CD , MAX(CASE WHEN X.SN = 1 THEN X.VRTY_CD ELSE NULL END) AS VRTY_CD_1 , MAX(CASE WHEN X.SN = 2 THEN X.VRTY_CD ELSE NULL END) AS VRTY_CD_2 , MAX(CASE WHEN X.SN = 3 THEN X.VRTY_CD ELSE NULL END) AS VRTY_CD_3 , MAX(CASE WHEN X.SN = 4 THEN X.VRTY_CD ELSE NULL END) AS VRTY_CD_4 , MAX(CASE WHEN X.SN = 5 THEN X.VRTY_CD ELSE NULL END) AS VRTY_CD_5 FROM ( SELECT VC.ITEM_CD , VC.VRTY_CD , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY VC.SN, VC.VRTY_CD) AS SN FROM TB_APC_VRTY_CRTR VC WHERE VC.APC_CD = #{apcCd} AND VC.ITEM_CD = #{itemCd} AND VC.DEL_YN = 'N' ) X GROUP BY X.ITEM_CD ) ITM ON ITM.ITEM_CD = A.ITEM_CD WHERE A.APC_CD IS NOT NULL GROUP BY A.APC_CD , A.WRHS_BGNG_YMD , A.WRHS_END_YMD , A.PRDCR_CD , A.ITEM_CD ) pt0 ORDER BY APC_CD , WRHS_BGNG_YMD , WRHS_END_YMD , PRDCR_CD , ITEM_CD
